cn.sharesdk.framework

类 TitleLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • cn.sharesdk.framework.TitleLayout

  • public class TitleLayout
extends LinearLayout
    This is a built-in "title bar" controls, mainly used for authorization.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TitleLayout(Context context) 
      TitleLayout(Context context, AttributeSet attrs) 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ImageView getBtnBack()
      "close" button
      TextView getBtnRight()
      return the button in the right of the title which is hidden most of the time
      TextView getTvTitle()
      returns the textview of title

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
